1.2.4.name: wordpress/christmas-advent-calendar
1.2.4.description:
Important: The calendars will not be activated before December 1th. But then its game on!.

Participating is free and should be fun!

The plugin currently supports english, norwegian, swedish and danish.

Premium

What do I get?

  1. A javascript-based calendar that doesn't break on iPad and iPhone
  2. 24 slots that doesn't open prematurely
  3. Add pics or video to your questions & competitions
  4. Fully integrated with Youtube and Vimeo
  5. Facebook support (add your calendar to your Facebook pages)
  6. Google Analytics support
  7. An automatically daily email reminder to your recipients/contestants
  8. One-click export of all contestants
  9. An admin-panel to draw winners
  10. Your calendar will be promoted on julekalender.com and through Wordpress

Why buy?
